website_summaries.verdict: A well made travel tray with just about all the features kids or parents could ask for. If you like extras, this one comes with a couple of bonus items.
pros: High quality fabric covering is tough and durable
Tray surface is sturdy enough for play, but soft enough to be safe
Loads of pockets, a bottle holder, and clear tablet strap
Colorful animal prints offer visual interest
Comes with a free coloring book and 10 pencil crayons for out-of-the-box fun
cons: Cup holder can be difficult for little arm's to reach

customer_reviews.title: The material was very durable and stays easy to clean for her while she eats and spills ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece as we were going on a road trip, and was impressed by how durable and versatile this travel tray was. The material was very durable and stays easy to clean for her while she eats and spills during the trip. And she was kept well entertained by the toys, books and coloring books we stored on the organizer. She lovesss animals so the coloring book was perfect!! Love how cute and perfect this was!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE if you have kids!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Amazing! And Amazing! What a great holiday treat for my 4 year old son. He always has trouble staying still in the car whenever we go a long trip anywhere. This weekend I gave him this travel tray and he was so delighted to have it as his play area. The features on this tray were really nice as well. We normally have trouble fitting all of his toy and a water bottle but this tray has everything you ever wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Attention Grabber!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my exercise buddy. She has a granddaughter who visits often, and she just loved it. Now when my buddy travels and has the little one in the car along for the ride, she can simply entertain her with this amazing travel tray and presto! no more maddening excursions which she always complained about. I was pleased that I was able to find such a perfect solution for her. I highly recommend gifting this delightful attention grabber to whomever needs to keep their little ones busy riding in the back seat of the car.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson as an early Christmas present and he absolutely loved it. He just turned 3 years old and we got him to go on a long road trip with us without always needing attention every 10 minutes! It was incredible what this travel tray can do! He was completely distracted with his toys. The mesh pockets were super convenient in holding his sippy cup and all his toys. Great product overall! Highly recommend this to any parent with a young one.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Colorful, & Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicer kids' travel trays that I've seen. It's well made and comes inside a sturdy carrying case. It has a colorful pattern and includes a coloring book and 10 colored pencils. There are also two pockets inside the tray, one on either side. In addition, there are two snap-on pockets for the outside. One thing that I've noticed about some of the other travel trays is that they offgas. This one did not. Instead, it had a very low odor.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Drove over 3,000 miles cross country with my little grand-baby co-pilot. This thing was great! He could draw, eat a snack, set down his sippy cup, and it even has a little clear pocket in the front where I put my cell phone for him to watch movies! Dump out a few m&ms onto the tray, turn on Netflix and we were good to go! Held up great to a couple weeks of being abused by a 4 year old. Total life saver for our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Realityone22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long road trip
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our very long road trip we took in September. They fit over the carseats great (we have 2 different kinds, Chicco and Graco). The books that came with them were great too. They were big enough to fit coloring books on but not obnoxiously big.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works well in the car.
customer_reviews.text: These seems well made and has worked well in the car. The previous one we had didn't have the little elastic bands on the inside of the lip and those have turned out to be very handy. I would recommend this and the colored pencils and coloring book that came were an added bonus. The zipper bag that this came in can be reused for something else.
customer_reviews.author: LDwyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tray with all included stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray with all included stuff. It keeps our kid occupied and stops him from acting up in the car and driving my wife crazy. Also, keeps our cars nice and clean. The product is of high quality and looks a lot better than in the images. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hratch M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tray
customer_reviews.text: This tray is awesome. It velcros together in seconds. We put it over my 3 yo’s lap in the car for eating. He loves it. It’s gone on a couple flights and does nicely without the car seat holding it up. The pockets hold crayons and other long car trip necessities. We’ve had it several months and it’s held up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and doesn’t fit over the car seat like it’s supposed to. We have a Graco 4Ever car seat. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie S

customer_reviews.title: I like this and it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like this and it does the job, but we don't use it as often as I had hoped, because it's a little cumbersome. Also, the fact that it has to hook around the carseat means that it requires a parent to set up and remove. I wish she could just unhook it when she's done using it, rather than me having to stop the car.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trip
customer_reviews.text: I do with this product was a little thicker but worked well for my 4 year old on our 7 hour car ride. He ate snacks on it and it wiped off easily. He was also able to use it to color. It was also easy to assemble and attach
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Not convienent
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product. My son hated it because it wouldn’t sit flat over his toddler car seat. It angled towards him so all his toys rolled into him. I also didn’t like that it didn’t have a removable covering. If he ever spilled anything on it then it would be difficult to clean. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: E. Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Great product for road trips and airplanes
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! Great quality and works great for road trips and airplane rides. Keeps our active 2 year old busy with the many activities she can do with a flat surface. We also used this as her carry on with the bag it came with. We were able to fit the tray, all her toys, coloring books, stuffed animal and an iPad in it well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The product got here super fast. I ordered this for my kid to ...
customer_reviews.text: The product got here super fast. I ordered this for my kid to use when ever to long car ride. After putting all of the pieces together, I got to said the quality of this is great. Very sturdy and just the right amount of space for a kid. LOVE the zipper pouch, keeps all the color pencil, marker, and crayon in one place. My son's already enjoying the coloring book! This is a must have for parents who travel with kids. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kaly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling! Did what it needed to do for my 2 year old. He was able to eat and use his tablet. He also colored. It’s easy to remove when it’s time to get out of the vehicle and does not take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: MSHILL

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It is not quite as wide as it could be which leads to an awkward fit, but it is usable and secure. Because of the width issues, the outer flaps stick out and make them awkward to use for storing things in the outer pockets. A narrower car seat would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Czerwinski

customer_reviews.title: My boy loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was probably one of my better purchases on Amazon. It was such a value buy compared to the other products. My baby boy was so happy to be playing his toys a tray in his car seat. The long buckle straps were super nice as well. It was easy to strap it on and it feel very sturdy so I am not afraid my boy ruining it in the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Munizaga

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because we do road trips often and I thought this would be fun for him. It doesn't sit over his car seat (Britax) very well. He ended up not liking it because it would sit flat for him.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! His carseat is a bit to big for the flaps but he loves using it as a coloring table in the car! Esspecially on longer rides. The "stickers" that came in the coloring but dont stick as all.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely not worth the price. They are small and not terribly sturdy. They don’t latch very tightly so things just kind of fall everywhere. It’s a great concept but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: Safety should be first...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, but I'm sending them back unused because they are way too rigid. I feel like they would be super unsafe in an accident. They are great and I would've loved them if it wasn't for the safety concern.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good idea, but it’s way to big to travel ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good idea, but it’s way to big to travel on a plane and fit in a personal carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for travel and fits well over most car seats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my friends 4 year old girl as a gift. She absolutely loves it and uses the tray to keep her crayons organized with her coloring books. It’s great for travel and fits well over most car seats. The bonus gift is nice. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: YYEEEESSSSSSS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Something I bought on Amazon that is amazing! This tray is great I love it the kids love it I even think the car loves it! Very easy to travel with very well-made definitely recommend for any parent on the go! Thank you so much whoever made this thing
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Dealz

customer_reviews.title: Held up great with 4 year old boy and 16 hour car trip.
customer_reviews.text: It made it to and from the East coast from the Midwest being used by my 4 year old boy and it doesn’t even look like it’s been used. It was definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. It’s more sturdy than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It’s more sturdy than I expected. Looks just like the pictures. Vibrant colors. Works perfectly. The straps are easy to adjust. The bag it comes with is good quality too, and so convenient. My busy 2.5 year old son loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your 4 yr old son as he eats ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your 4 yr old son as he eats in the whenever we go out, now there's no mess, well, minimal mess as he always finds a way to get stuff on the floors, but overall, stuff stays in the tray.
customer_reviews.author: ramkirpaul

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect on our trip, my toddler loves to play with his toys on the airplane tray but it’s a pain in neck his toys falling and sometimes not able to pick it up. This tray was the best solution we also could put his tablet on the tray so he could watch his shows and play with the toys
customer_reviews.author: janeide

customer_reviews.title: Useful and fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item! My daughter used it on the airplane for my grandson and it worked great!!!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this tray was superb! We cannot believe what we paid for. The material was super nice to the feel. My baby is only 2 years old and he would sometimes would just toss his toys and smacks the tray but the tray is super flexible but at the same time strong and firm! I will probably make another purchase for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son to have something to do besides watch video on a 8hr road trip. Haven't use it in the car yet looks like out will do the job. Material feels nice and sturdy, Easy to adjust, and cute vibrant colors. I like that it lays flat and came with a carry case. Coloring book only has a few pages but still a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Folds for storage
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great concept but my son is not a fan. He is shy of 3 and we got it for a 16 hour car ride. I’ll try it again when he is older.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for traveling. Able to color & eats snacks on them
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: The outer pockets are super useful to store the pencils and her water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 years old daughter and she loves it. It is very convenient to keep her entertained when we travel. The outer pockets are super useful to store the pencils and her water bottle. Nice, colorful and sturdy. Will definitely use it a lot. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Went on a long trip ! My nephew was entertained for hours playing on this table top tray! Well worth the money and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worked well with my toddler on plane!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for traveling with a toddler on a plane! I just wish it folded smaller or something so it could fit in a diaper bag, it's too bulky and it sucks carrying an extra item, children already need so much crap lol and that's the only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. It keeps our grandson occupied in the car. He just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this product they use it every time we are in the car. I love the fact that it comes with colored pencils and not crayons that melt in the car. Two thing I think I would change is having a small back to put the pencils in and a pencil sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pedigo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, less screen time!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for our niece Chloe who's just learning how to draw and color. Her parents were thrilled with giving her car entertainment that didn't include an ipad or iphone. Arrived in perfect condition =)
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!! Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this travel tray for those who have trouble keeping your kiddo still during car rides. Before our long road trip to my mom's house, I got this for my 3 year old and he absolutely loved it. He was so delighted with the coloring book which kept him busy all the way through. I especially love all the mesh pockets on the side to put his bottle and toys. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great item to keep kids and parents sane
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my grandsons. This reminds me of my childhood
customer_reviews.author: melody sclippa

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for long car rides. My 4 year old loved having it for playing, drawing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jovigirl214

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. Durable fabric scrubs clean from car trip snacks. Easy to use. 2 and 3 yr old really liked them!

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for children
customer_reviews.text: Kept my grandson entertained for quite a while on a long Taos trip. Easy to transport in travel case

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and uses it every day in the car. I spent a lot of time reading reviews of these and this one definitely met my expectations! Easy to clip on and off around her car seat.

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great for car trips with my two year old son. Really helps keep toys handy for him and makes a great little tabletop for snacks on the go.

customer_reviews.title: Great busy bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to carry all the little books and entertainment needed to keep them busy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Bought as a gift for my little ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Bought as a gift for my little niece. Turn out, her parents love it, even more, seeing how much she enjoyed it.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a long 12 hour flight !
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Combination. Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my nephews birthday. He loves and happy with my gift. Beautiful design and high quality materials. This product has so many interesting for kids and Free coloring book set. No one can beat that! One of my friends purchased Car seat tray right after the birthday party finished.

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons second birthday. He always wanted something to play with whenever he is in the car so this was a perfect thing for him. The mesh pockets are super useful in terms of keeping all of his stuff neat and organized. The overall structure of the tray was very sturdy and robust. Super happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, they have fun time play around with it. Recommend it

customer_reviews.title: This thing fit great on our carseat
customer_reviews.text: This thing fit great on our carseat. The pouches on the sides are easy for our 4 year old to get into. Desk is sturdy, I'm happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great response time
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this product, and it makes car rides so much easier. One of the straps broke, and the company responded almost instantly to fix the problem. I would highly recommend both the product and company.

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips.

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully in keeping the kids interested and occupied (every parents ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this prior to a Holiday road trip. It worked wonderfully in keeping the kids interested and occupied (every parents hope) during the trip. It is easy to setup, and high quality construction. Ir provides a place for everything so we can avoid diving into the back of the minivan to find lost pencils / pens. I really like the side pockets, and the pencil included pencil set! It helped us avoid a last minute trip to the store before our trip. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ebel

product_meta.title: Car Seat Tray with Coloring Activity Set by BO Innovation | Car Seat Tray for Car, Stroller, Plane | Toddler, Baby, Kids Play Tray | Exclusive Coloring Book + Pencils + Stickers Set
product_meta.description:
The Best Travel & Play Tray with Amazing Features

 * Sturdy, Flexible, and Soft - Made with high quality 900D Gucci Nyon material!
 * Extra Long Straps - Compatible with any type of toddler and baby car seat and sizes! 
 * Detachable Mesh Pockets - Mesh side pockets featuring a cup holder are conveniently detachable by our button design!
 * BONUS Coloring Book Set - Includes an EXCLUSIVE Coloring Book set & 8 colored pencils!
 * Captivating Graphics Illustration - Inspire and spark your child's imagination with our kid friendly animal kingdom design! 

Use The Play and Travel Tray in Creative Ways

On the Go Entertainment!Makes a perfect play area on a stroller, car seat, airplane ride, dinner table, train, or any travel activities!

 Best Solution for your Kid! Long car trips may seem long with messy, hungry kids. This travel tray organizer is the perfect solution to provide an easy-to-clean playground for children to entertain themselves while keeping everything they need within an arm's reach!

Keep The Car Floors Clean! Are you tired of always having to clean up after your kids after every car ride? This travel play tray has easily accessible mesh pockets on the side for everything your kid will ever need! Drinks, Snacks, Toys, Coloring Books, and More! Keep your car clean and organized!

Product Details

 * Material: High quality 900D Gucci Nylon Fabric
 * Dimension: 17 x 12.6 x 3.9 Inches
 * Package: Conveniently packed with a beautiful Gucci Nylon PVC Bag
 * BONUS Accessory: Includes a coloring book set with 8 colored pencils
 * Key Features: Detachable mesh pockets and sidewalls
feature_bullets: ✔️ Summer Time - Welcome to Summer Break to you and your family! Our Travel Tray is second to none the best travel gadget for kids of all ages. Grab yours today and start traveling with the best Travel Tray.

✔️ A ROAD TRIP ESSENTIAL - Our Kids Travel Tray takes away the stress that comes when traveling with little ones! Grab yours today and keep the children entertained for hours on end! Start your travel with us! A On the GO Entertainment!

✔️ BONUS COLORING BOOK SET - It is not easy to always keep your little ones entertained for hours on end. Our portable travel tray comes with an exclusive coloring book set with 10 coloring pencils. With our coloring activity, it would make the long trip enjoyable for any baby, infant, or kid in the back seat.

✔️OUR DESIGN- Keeping an organized back seat isn't easy when traveling with little ones. We got the best solution for you with our foldable carseat tray. It has high walls to keep toys and things organized in one place. It features a mesh pocket for snack, a cup holder storage for drinks, and a soft yet robust surface for kids to play on.

✔️ HAPPY FOR ALL - We are confident this travel tray will keep you and your family happy for all of the road trips to come. If you ever decide this product is not right for you, we are more than happy to give you FULL REFUND, no questions asked.
